org.lsmr.vending.hardware

Interface AbstractHardwareListener

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    CoinRackListener, CoinReceptacleListener, CoinReturnListener, CoinSlotListener, DeliveryChuteListener, DisplayListener, IndicatorLightListener, LockListener, PopCanRackListener, PushButtonListener

    public interface AbstractHardwareListener
    This class represents the abstract interface for all hardware listeners. All subclasses should add their own event notification methods, the first parameter of which should always be the instance affected.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void disabled(AbstractHardware<? extends AbstractHardwareListener> hardware)
      Announces that the indicated hardware has been disabled.
      void enabled(AbstractHardware<? extends AbstractHardwareListener> hardware)
      Announces that the indicated hardware has been enabled.

    • Method Detail

      • enabled

        void enabled(AbstractHardware<? extends AbstractHardwareListener> hardware)
        Announces that the indicated hardware has been enabled.
        Parameters:
        hardware - The device that has been enabled.

      • disabled

        void disabled(AbstractHardware<? extends AbstractHardwareListener> hardware)
        Announces that the indicated hardware has been disabled.
        Parameters:
        hardware - The device that has been enabled.
